snippet: The Pentagon said Tuesday that it planned to establish a searchable database of military valor awards.
abstract: Pentagon says it plans to establish a searchable database of military valor awards; the decision stems from a Supreme Court ruling that invalidated a law making it a crime to lie about receiving military awards.
lead_paragraph: The Pentagon said Tuesday that it planned to establish a searchable database of military valor awards.

headline.main: Pentagon to Set Up Database on Military Awards
headline.print_headline: Pentagon To Set Up Database On Military Awards

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
